channel.title: Jinja2 on Technology Blog Wim
channel.description: Recent content in Jinja2 on Technology Blog Wim

item.title: Use Python requests and Jinja2 to configure ACI
item.description: Introduction In a previous post, we introduced how we could interact with Cisco’s ACI solution using Python. This post will build on the things we learned in that blog post.

item.title: Python and Jinja2 introduction
item.description: What is Jinja2? Jinja is a modern and designer-friendly templating language for Python. The idea is to combine a template with data to produce documents.
